name: Equipment detailed Report
query:
select
    `tabEquipment Uptime`.mac_id as "Mac Id:Data/Mac Id",
    `tabEquipment Uptime`.equipment_name as "Equipment Name:Data/Equipment Name",
    `tabEquipment Uptime`.site as "Site:Link/School",
    `tabEquipment Uptime`.site_name as "Site name:Select/Site name",
    `tabEquipment Uptime`.district as "District:Data/District",
    `tabEquipment Uptime`.from_time as "From time:Date/From time",
    `tabEquipment Uptime`.to_time as "To time:Date/To time",
    `tabEquipment Uptime`.total_uptime as "Total Uptime:Int/Total Uptime",
    `tabEquipment Uptime`.from_date_and_time as "From Date and Time:Data/From Date and Time",
    `tabEquipment Uptime`.to_date_and_time as "To Date and Time:Data/To Date and Time",
    `tabEquipment Uptime`.total_downtime as "Total downtime:Int/Total downtime",
    count(district) as Districts
from `tabEquipment Uptime`
Group by district
